exercises.title: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Perform dynamic jumping jacks to increase heart rate and warm up the muscles.
exercises.details: Keep a steady pace, maintain an upright posture, and land softly to reduce impact on the joints.

exercises.title: Arm Circles
exercises.description: Move your arms in circular motions to warm up the shoulders.
exercises.details: Start with small circles and gradually increase the size. Reverse the direction halfway through.

exercises.title: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place while lifting your knees to hip level.
exercises.details: Keep your core engaged and land softly on your feet.

exercises.title: Shoulder Shrugs
exercises.description: Raise and lower your shoulders to release tension and prepare for upper body exercises.
exercises.details: Avoid tensing your neck; keep movements controlled and smooth.

exercises.title: Leg Swings
exercises.description: Swing one leg forward and backward to warm up the hips and legs.
exercises.details: Hold onto a stable surface for balance and keep movements controlled.

exercises.title: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Grip the bar with your palms facing forward and pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar.
exercises.details: Keep your core engaged and avoid swinging for better muscle activation.

exercises.title: Push-ups
exercises.description: Lower your chest to the ground and push back up while keeping your body straight.
exercises.details: Engage your core, keep elbows slightly tucked, and maintain a controlled pace.

exercises.title: Squats
exercises.description: Lower your body by bending your knees and hips, then return to a standing position.
exercises.details: Keep your back straight, knees aligned with toes, and push through your heels.

exercises.title: Dips
exercises.description: Use parallel bars or a bench to lower and lift your body using your triceps and shoulders.
exercises.details: Keep your elbows close to your body and avoid swinging.

exercises.title: Plank Hold
exercises.description: Maintain a straight body position while supporting yourself on your forearms and toes.
exercises.details: Engage your core and avoid letting your hips sag.

exercises.title: Deep Breathing
exercises.description: Inhale deeply through the nose, hold, and exhale slowly through the mouth.
exercises.details: Focus on slow and controlled breathing to relax the nervous system.

exercises.title: Standing Hamstring Stretch
exercises.description: Bend forward at the hips and reach for your toes to stretch the hamstrings.
exercises.details: Keep your knees slightly bent if needed and avoid bouncing.

exercises.title: Shoulder Stretch
exercises.description: Cross one arm over your chest and use the opposite hand to hold it in place.
exercises.details: Keep your shoulders relaxed and breathe deeply.

exercises.title: Seated Forward Fold
exercises.description: Sit with your legs extended and reach forward toward your toes.
exercises.details: Keep your back straight and avoid straining.

exercises.title: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: Move between arching and rounding your back while on all fours.
exercises.details: Synchronize movements with your breath for relaxation.
